did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Guide to the Henry W. Dustan Veterinary Class Notebook,
1897

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One bound book of notes taken by Henry W. Dustan while a student at the New York State College of Veterinary Medicine.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Henry W. Dustan received his DVM degree from the New York State College of Veterinary Medicine in 1898.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One bound book of notes taken by Henry W. Dustan while a student at the New York State College of Veterinary Medicine.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Veterinary Medicine

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: The binding is extremely fragile. Photocopying may be prohibited.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Henry W. Dustan Veterinary Class Notebook, #37-05-3378. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

custodhist.head: HISTORY OF OWNERSHIP
custodhist.p: Donated to the Flower-Sprecher Veterinary Library by Dr. Dustan's daughter, Alice Kollar, in 1987.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Transfered from the Flower-Sprecher Veterinary Library in 2004
